info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Warren and northern Saratoga Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 430 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Day Center, or 14 miles west of Glens Falls, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glens Falls, Corinth, West Glens Falls, Lake Luzerne Campground, Day Center, Glens Falls North, Queensbury, Lake Luzerne, Hadley, Beartown, French Mountain, Fourth Lake, Conklingville, Gansevoort, Paradise Beach, Hartman, Lake Luzerne-Hadley, Allentown, Randall Corner and Danielstown. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 17S and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
